attributes.action: Review practices of Social Services and CAFCASS in relation to concerns about the welfare of children brought to light by those seeking to gain residency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children are often used as a weapon by the partner not attempting to gain either residency or even access.  The parent who is not the full time care giver has to put up with official bodies ignoring any concerns about welfare for the child, just because they do not care for the child full time.

Organisations such as CAFCASS and Social Services are supposed to be there to take the welfare of any children involved, but often, are too biased against the non-"full time" parent to give concerns a fair hearing.
